last_episode_to_air.name: Live Free and Thrive
last_episode_to_air.overview: The arrival of spring finds the houseboaters recalling six months of harsh winter. Meanwhile, Pike Mike attempts to move back to Great Slave Lake; Stephan and Allyce explore the wilderness near their new home; and Henry recovers from heart surgery.

name: Ice Lake Rebels
overview: Follow along as a handful of survivalist battle brutal weather and living conditions on Great Slave Lake.

episodes.name: Winter is Coming
episodes.overview: In the premiere of this reality series about the residents of an autonomous community on Great Slave Lake in Canada's Northwest Territories, Randy hunts for moose, but jeopardizes his cover walking across a frozen lake; Stephan and Allyce try to fix the floats on their houseboat; Pike Mike attempts to secure his home; and newcomers Iman and Jessica must adapt to their surroundings in a hurry.

episodes.name: Fight for Food
episodes.overview: Randy hunts for caribou for the last time before winter sets in; Brian and Henry begin their quest to fill nine empty freezers with fish; Pike Mike shares local fishing techniques with Stephan and Allyce.

episodes.name: Ice Rules
episodes.overview: Molly comes home to the lake from Vancouver to help her father, Gary, open a restaurant; Randy's successful caribou hunt means he can enter an ice-carving competition; Stephan and Allyce face a dangerous situation when their heat is turned off; Brian and Henry need help fixing their fishing vessel.

episodes.name: Cold Snap
episodes.overview: The temperature is plummeting when Stephan and Allyce return from a fishing expedition and discover that their houseboat has no heat and their pipes are freezing.

episodes.name: The Lake Is a Bear
episodes.overview: The end of winter storms provides some relief, but food is still scarce until the spring thaw, so Ragnar goes hunting for bear. Meanwhile, Stephan and Allyce hope to find fish in the open lake; and Randy gets creative to set his snares.

episodes.name: Ice Lake Games
episodes.overview: With breakup of the lake on the horizon, our Rebels battle "cabin fever" by honing their survival skills at an annual ‘lake games’, but an accident on the ice reminds them that the lake is still in charge.

episodes.name: Sink or Swim
episodes.overview: A community safety meeting is held as the ice begins to soften, and the gathering is well-timed when Brian falls through the ice, but is rescued by Henry, and Gary teaches Molly how to escape a similar situation. Meanwhile, Randy builds a floating mobile home to be used after the ice melts.

episodes.name: Cracks in the Ice
episodes.overview: High winds that break up ice present a challenge for Gary and Molly, who hurry to secure their home before the storm gets worse, while Stephan and Allyce use a motorboat to break up large ice sheets into smaller chunks.

episodes.name: My Big Fat Lake Wedding
episodes.overview: It seems that everyone is moving... literally; Stephan and Allyce finally get married; Pike Mike plans on moving to a quieter part of the lake; Randy gets his cabin-sized raft stuck on a sheet of ice in the river.

episodes.name: Ice-Shattering Moments
episodes.overview: Special behind the scenes inside look at the very real dangers involved in filming this groundbreaking show; the crew has to rescue themselves when their vehicle crashes through ice and begins to sink and become part of all the danger.

episodes.name: The Honeymoon Is Over
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 premiere, Gary tries to save Molly's barge from sinking; Stephan and Allyce work on their aging boat; and Pike Mike deals with harsh winds.

episodes.name: Alone in the Wild
episodes.overview: Ragnar looks for a visitor who's lost in the tundra; a bigger home means isolation for Stephan and Allyce; Kyle and Payton can't figure out how to move their new barge.

episodes.name: Far & Away
episodes.overview: Molly learns survival skills from Pike Mike; Stephan and Allyce's dog is a target for wolves at their remote cabin; Kyle and Peyton shield themselves from the severe cold in a makeshift tent.

episodes.name: Of Ice and Skins
episodes.overview: Molly builds a water pump to avoid drilling through six feet of ice; Stephan and Allyce learn that their water is contaminated; Kyle and Peyton draw on their heritage to cure meat and preserve a hide.

episodes.name: Ice Lake Ingenuity
episodes.overview: Molly installs a wind turbine during an ice storm with help from Stephan; Pike Mike's food supply and peace of mind are threatened by a lack of fish and a new neighbor; Ragnar takes advantage of harsh weather to find Canadian diamonds in a secret location.

episodes.name: Slipping and Sliding
episodes.overview: Stephan faces a risky journey as rising temperatures turn ice into slush. Meanwhile, Kyle and Peyton seek shelter to save their boat; and Pike Mike is injured when he's in the woods by himself.

episodes.name: Breaking Up is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: A truck sinks into the lake when the ice starts to melt; Stephan and Allyce try to save their boat from being crushed by cutting it free; Kyle needs a new way to get home after abandoning a snowmobile.

episodes.name: Fire and Water
episodes.overview: Kyle and Peyton see a bear near their home, which makes them reconsider their living situation. Meanwhile, Stephan causes a fire that could have catastrophic consequences; and Pike Mike is in danger after falling into extremely cold water.

episodes.name: Live Free and Thrive
episodes.overview: The arrival of spring finds the houseboaters recalling six months of harsh winter. Meanwhile, Pike Mike attempts to move back to Great Slave Lake; Stephan and Allyce explore the wilderness near their new home; and Henry recovers from heart surgery.
